channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- Bazel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- Bazel

item.title: CVE-2022-3474|2024-08-03T01:14:01.488Z -- google%20llc -- bazel
item.description: A bad credential handling in the remote assets API for Bazel versions prior to 5.3.2 and 4.2.3 sends all user-provided credentials instead of only the required ones for the requests. We recommend upgrading to versions later than or equal to 5.3.2 or 4.2.3.
